overview: Julia, the daughter of Telis, general manager of the steel company, is a rich girl who likes the good living. Grigoris, a poor employee in the company who is in love with Julia, after a series of misunderstandings will lose his job and be fired ...

production_companies.name: Afoi Roussopouloi-G. Lazaridis - D. Sarris - K. Psarras

title: The Young Lady's Fool
